properties.title: Brisenhaus
properties.abstract: En cas d'absence du gardien seulement local de s√©jour
properties.description: The Brisenhaus is a Swiss refuge in the northern Alps of Uri. It lies in the canton of Nidwalden north of the Brisen at 1753 m above sea level at the Beckenriederalp at the north-west foot of the Risetenstock (2290 m) and the Glattegrat. The hut is maintained by the Pilatus section of the Swiss Alpine Club (SAC).
